Catalano.Imaging.Concurrent.Filters

Class HSLFiltering

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Concurrent.Filters.HSLFiltering
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class HSLFiltering
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Color filtering in HSL color space. The filter operates in HSL color space and filters pixels, which color is inside/outside of the specified HSL range - it keeps pixels with colors inside/outside of the specified range and fills the rest with FillColor specified color.
